marriage.description: Governs marriage, divorce, restitution of conjugal rights, and conditions for valid marriage for Hindus, Sikhs, Buddhists, and Jains.

adoption.description: Regulates adoption procedures and maintenance obligations for Hindus, including eligibility and legal effects of adoption.

succession.description: Defines rules of inheritance and succession for Hindus, including intestate and testamentary succession, with amendments for gender equality.

maintenance.description: Provides for maintenance of dependents, including wives, children, and aged parents, under Hindu law.

marriage.description: Governs marriage under Islamic law, including nikah, mehr, and conditions for valid marriage, supplemented by the Dissolution of Muslim Marriages Act, 1939 for divorce.

divorce.act_name: Dissolution of Muslim Marriages Act, 1939; Muslim Women (Protection of Rights on Divorce) Act, 1986
divorce.description: Regulates grounds for divorce for Muslim women and provides maintenance rights post-divorce, with triple talaq banned under the Muslim Women (Protection of Rights on Marriage) Act, 2019.

succession.description: Governs inheritance based on Islamic law, with rules for distribution of property among heirs as per Shariat.

maintenance.act_name: Muslim Women (Protection of Rights on Divorce) Act, 1986
maintenance.description: Provides for maintenance for Muslim women post-divorce, supplemented by general laws like Section 125 of CrPC.

marriage.description: Governs the solemnization and registration of marriages for Christians in India.

divorce.description: Regulates divorce and matrimonial causes for Christians, including grounds for dissolution and judicial separation.

succession.description: Governs intestate and testamentary succession for Christians, with specific provisions in Sections 29–49.

maintenance.description: Provides for maintenance during divorce proceedings and under general criminal procedure for spouses and children.

marriage.description: Governs marriage and divorce for Parsis, including registration and grounds for dissolution.

succession.description: Applies to Parsis for intestate and testamentary succession, with specific provisions in Sections 50–56.

maintenance.description: Provides for maintenance during and post-divorce for Parsi spouses and children.

marriage.description: Governs secular and interfaith marriages for all citizens, including Sikhs, Buddhists, Jains, and those opting for civil marriage, irrespective of religion.

adoption.act_name: Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2015
adoption.description: Provides a secular framework for adoption for all communities, including non-Hindus, through the Central Adoption Resource Authority (CARA).

succession.description: Applies to Sikhs, Buddhists, Jains, and others not covered by Hindu or Muslim personal laws for intestate and testamentary succession.

maintenance.act_name: Section 125 of CrPC; Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
maintenance.description: Secular laws providing maintenance for spouses, children, and parents, applicable to all communities.
